Package org.codehaus.preon.hex

Interface Summary
DumpFragment A fixed-size framgment of output.
HexDumpTarget  
 

Class Summary
AppendableHexDumpTarget  
BytesAsCharFragment A DumpFragment that translates every byte to a character representation - as long as it makes sense.
BytesAsHexFragment A DumpFragment that translates every byte to a two-character hex represenation, with support for grouping.
HexDumper A utility for generating hexdumps.
LinePosFragment A DumpFragment that will generate the line position, with the given number of characters, with trailing zeroes if required.
LiteralFragment A DumpFragment that will continuously generate the same literal, over and over again, for every line getting generated.
XmlWriterHexDumpTarget  
 

Exception Summary
HexDumperException
